      • checkOtherFactors

        public void checkOtherFactors()

      • draftCards

        public void draftCards(java.util.Random rand)
        Jeffrey McCall This method drafts 2 cards. The policy, region, and food sample space ArrayLists from AI.java are accessed to pick which policy, region and foods should be used when drafting the 2 cards. If the decrease of factor's in the AI's region are greater than 20% after the last turn, then pickThisRegion is true and the AI is much more likely to draft a card that affects it's own region.
        Parameters:
        rand - A Random object.

      • distributeProbabilities

        public void distributeProbabilities(int playAgain,
                                    GameCard card,
                                    java.lang.String type)
        Jeffrey McCall This method will change the probability values in an array list of probability values. The probability is decreased if playAgain==-1. It is increased if playAgain==1. This is done for foods, regions and policies.
        Parameters:
        playAgain - An int value which determines how the probability is altered.
        card - The policy card that was drafted last turn that we are checking.
        type - The type of item that the probabilities relate to.
